params._poolId: The pool ID of the underlying V4 pool

params.observationCardinalityNext: The desired minimum number of observations for the oracle to store

params.index: The element of the observations array to fetch

returns.initialized: Whether the observation has been initialized and the values are safe to use
returns.secondsPerLiquidityCumulativeX128: The seconds per in range liquidity for the life of the pool (always 0 in V4)
returns.tickCumulativeTruncated: The truncated tick multiplied by seconds elapsed for the life of the pool as of the observation timestamp.

params.secondsAgos: From how long ago each cumulative tick and liquidity value should be returned

returns.secondsPerLiquidityCumulativeX128s: Cumulative seconds per liquidity-in-range value (always empty in V4)
returns.tickCumulativesTruncated: Truncated cumulative tick values as of each `secondsAgos` from the current block timestamp

returns.feeProtocol: The protocol fee for this pool (not used in V4, always 0)
returns.observationCardinality: The current maximum number of observations stored in the oracle
returns.observationCardinalityNext: The next maximum number of observations that can be stored in the oracle
returns.observationIndex: The index of the last oracle observation that was written
returns.sqrtPriceX96: The current price of the oracle as a sqrt(currency1/currency0) Q64.96 value
returns.tick: The current tick of the oracle
returns.unlocked: Whether the pool is currently unlocked (always true for V4)

constructor.notice: Initializes the adapter with the V3StyleOracleHook contract and pool ID.

increaseObservationCardinalityNext(uint1.notice: Increase the maximum number of price observations that this oracle will store.

manager().notice: The canonical Uniswap V4 pool manager.

observations(uint256).notice: Returns data about a specific observation index.

observe(uint32[]).notice: Returns the truncated cumulative tick values as of each timestamp `secondsAgo` from the current block timestamp.

poolId().notice: The pool ID of the underlying V4 pool.

slot0().notice: Emulates the behavior of the exposed zeroth slot of a Uniswap V3 pool.

v3StyleOracle().notice: The V3StyleOracleHook contract this adapter interacts with.
